column1: Mascalucia (Sicilian: Mascaluc√¨a) is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Catania in the Italian region Sicily
column2: located about 160 kilometres (99 mi) southeast of Palermo and about 6 kilometres (4 mi) north of Catania.

column1: Mascalucia borders the following municipalities: Belpasso
It is also the most populated Comune of Catania's province.
